title: 8/2 provs demoted hard
body: um so i was bronze 2 last season, not the greatest, however, i knew i deserved to be a higher rank as i do tend to carry (not trying to be a showoff) so season 6 comes around, and in my placements i went 8/2. i was expecting to at least get to silver from bronze 2, and was extremely confused when i got BRONZE 5. i dont know what is going, especially since i had good kda in every game and only fed in one game! someone please help????

replies.body: I was bronze 2 as well and went 7 out of 10 but got bronze 4.
